title: Seattle Police Department Cell Site Stimulator Usage

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. any policies, guidelines, manuals and/or instructions on department use of cell site stimulators (aka "stingrays"), including on the legal process required (such as a warrant or court order), if any, before operating a stingray;

2. any departmental records concerning this department’s use of stingrays now or plans to use stingrays in the future including:

a. the types of investigations or instances in which this department is using or plans to use stingrays, or how it plans to support, manage or oversee the usage of stingrays by another department or office;

b. policies, guidelines, manuals and/or instructions on storage requirements or procedures for communications content and metadata obtained through use of stingrays, including the kinds of metadata and content captured and storage retention times;

c. the duration for which stingrays may be operated as measured in consecutive days

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bailey Malone
